adjustment.translate: регулировка, регулирование, установка, приспособление, подгонка, согласование
examples: She made some slight adjustments to the recipe.
The engine only needed a minor adjustment.
We went through a period of adjustment at the new school.
I'm not sure how he'll make the emotional adjustment to retirement.
The rest of the apparel required little adjustment.
Moving from the city to the country requires an adjustment.
This adjustment of the figures allows a fairer comparison.
Once we make the adjustments for inflation, the fall in interest rates is quite small.
